used in stores, advertising, etc. to refer to clothes for men: The chief executive of the chain said that the menswear market remained highly competitive. Investors reacted positively to news that the high-street retailer was launching a new menswear range in September.
the department in a large store that sells men's clothing See also
childrenswear
womenswear
